data.content:
noun
the short term
a short period of time at the beginning of something
It will meet our needs, at least for the short term.
His plan has advantages over the short term.
usually used in the phrase in the short term
It won't make any difference in the short term. [=when a small amount of time has passed]
These changes may improve profits in the short term [=in the near future, in the short run], but they are going to cost us money in the long term. - compare long term
